law.text: Any person who willfully fails to perform any of his duties as set forth in this chapter shall be fined not less than fifty dollars ($50) nor more than one hundred dollars ($100) for each offense. Each day of refusal to serve and carry out the duties as prescribed by law shall constitute a separate offense.
law.history: Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 17, effective June 21, 1974.
